headers.subject: [tosdr:2051] [bad] You must cancel services before the end of trail periods to avoid being charged

html:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com and "other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough Microsoft.com has a different ToS).



9.7. Trial period offers. If you are taking part in any trial period offer, you must cancel the services by the end of the trial period to avoid incurring new charges, unless we notify you otherwise. If you don't cancel your services at the end of the trial period, we may charge you for the services.

 

From <http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement> 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: [bad] You must cancel services before the end of trail periods to avoid being charged
text:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, 
profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com and "other Microsoft 
Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough Microsoft.com has a 
different ToS).


9.7. Trial period offers. If you are taking part in any trial period offer, 
> you must cancel the services by the end of the trial period to avoid 
> incurring new charges, unless we notify you otherwise. If you don't cancel 
> your services at the end of the trial period, we may charge you for the 
> services.
>
>  
>
> From <
> http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement
> > 
>
